com.skyisland.questmanager.ui.menu.inventory

Class BasicInventoryItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.skyisland.questmanager.ui.menu.inventory.InventoryItem
      • com.skyisland.questmanager.ui.menu.inventory.BasicInventoryItem

  • public class BasicInventoryItem
extends InventoryItem
    An item used in an inventory menu. This is composed of an actual item stack, a display item type, and the cost and fame requirement of the item.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BasicInventoryItem(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack icon, java.util.List<java.lang.String> tooltip, MenuAction action)
      Makes a simple wrapper item that runs the provided action when clicked.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MenuAction getAction(QuestPlayer player)
      Return the action that should be performed when this menu item is clicked/activated
      org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack getDisplay(QuestPlayer player)
      Returns the item that should be used to display the item to the given player.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BasicInventoryItem

        public BasicInventoryItem(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack icon,
                          java.util.List<java.lang.String> tooltip,
                          MenuAction action)
        Makes a simple wrapper item that runs the provided action when clicked. Tooltip can be null.
        Parameters:
        tooltip - The tooltip to display. If null, no tooltip is displayed

    • Method Detail

      • getDisplay

        public org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack getDisplay(QuestPlayer player)
        Returns the item that should be used to display the item to the given player. This method formats the lore, etc to display correctly (and with correct colors) to the provided player given their fame and money. If the passed player is null, the item without lore is returned.
        Specified by:
        getDisplay in class InventoryItem

        public MenuAction getAction(QuestPlayer player)
        Description copied from class: InventoryItem
        Return the action that should be performed when this menu item is clicked/activated
        Specified by:
